grid.sql: SELECT qryReport.*, a.nimetus::VARCHAR(254), r.regkood::VARCHAR(20), r.nimetus::VARCHAR(254) AS asutus, coalesce(p.regkood, '')::VARCHAR(20) AS parregkood, coalesce(p.nimetus, '')::VARCHAR(254) AS parasutus FROM eelarve.eelarve_tulud($1::INTEGER, $2::DATE, $3::DATE, $4::BOOLEAN, $5::INTEGER, $6::INTEGER) qryReport INNER JOIN (SELECT id, parentid, regkood, nimetus FROM ou.rekv WHERE parentid < 999 UNION ALL SELECT 999999, 0, '' AS regkood, 'Kond' AS nimetus) r ON r.id = qryReport.rekv_id LEFT OUTER JOIN com_artikkel a ON a.kood::TEXT = qryReport.artikkel::TEXT LEFT OUTER JOIN ou.rekv p ON r.parentid = p.id
